explains: vt. 重新谈判；重新协商

sentences.en: If your parents are reluctant to renegotiate, you can speed the process along by letting your behavior show that you have the responsibility that goes with maturity.
sentences.cn: 如果你的父母不愿意重新协商，你可以通过让你的行为证明你有与成熟度相匹配的责任感来加快这个过程。
协商项目的最后期限（项目推迟）

sentences.en: For these reasons, Jung says he wants to renegotiate the agreement.
sentences.cn: 因为这些理由，郑仁哲说，他想就这项协定重新进行协商。
